article_title: Bicyclist Hospitalized After Being Hit by Van
article_text:
A crash early Saturday afternoon in Callaway sent a minor to the hospital with head injuries.

Around 12:30 pm, Callaway City Police say a man was hit by a van on the intersection of Lake Avenue and Highline Drive.

He was riding his bicycle down Highline Drive when he rode out in front of the van.

The victim was transported to Bay Medical with head trauma.
